# Ignore Python virtual environment files (common in WSL/Ubuntu)
venv/
pyvenv.cfg

# Ignore node_modules if using npm/yarn
node_modules/
package-lock.json

# Ignore build/output directories
dist/
build/

# Ignore OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore IDE/editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-workspace
*.sublime-project

# Ignore log files
*.log

# Ignore temporary files
*.tmp
*.bak

# Ignore system files
*.swp

# Ignore compiled output (if any)
*.js.map

# Ensure source files aren't ignored
!game_of_life.js
!index.html
!style.css
